		  402 Connect	phpMasterGeneric@192.168.1.1 on myDb
		  402 Query	SET NAMES UTF8, time_zone = "+0:00"
		  402 Query	SELECT * FROM customer WHERE idCustomer = 1
		  403 Connect	phpSlaveGeneric@192.168.1.2 on myDb
		  403 Query	SET NAMES UTF8, time_zone = "+0:00"
		  403 Query	SELECT * FROM customer
		  403 Query	SELECT email
                    FROM customer
                    WHERE idCustomer = 1
